articles.title: Boston protest personality Robby Roadsteamer detained by federal agents at Minneapolis protest
articles.description:
Robby Roadsteamer, the online name of Rob Potylo, was previously detained by ICE in Portland, Oregon in October. He shared videos of both arrests online.

The post Boston protest personality Robby Roadsteamer detained by federal agents at Minneapolis protest appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Update: Boston protest personality Robby Roadsteamer detai
